I may have found a suloution on the SAVEGAME problem. 
Your old saves sould be in
C:Program Files (x86)UbisoftUbisoft Game Launchersavegames

satart a new game and save.
your new savegames should be at:

C:UsersNAMEAppDataLocalUbisoft Game Launchersavegame_storage

just replace the new save files with the old ones.

1.save.metadata  etc etc
